EmailTemplate.subject: Is your communications network smart enough?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Efficient, secure and intelligent utility data handling Smart grids need smart networks Are you working to make your grid smarter using substation automation, distribution automation, and advanced metering infrastructure? Are you looking for flexibility to optimize emerging IP-based smart grid applications? Find out how a smarter communications network <[[http://www.electricenergyonline.com/show_article.php?mag=114&article=967]]> needs to be part of your new energy delivery strategy. © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> · Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> · Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/]]> <[[https://networks.nokia.com]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
